text: mryba: Trying to finalize dates. Should hopefully have it locked down next week and will announce it as soon as we can. Survey coming soon for this room. :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey All. We're still working on planning Developer Day 2017 -- and would love your input to ensure it's valuable. Mind taking this quick 4-question survey? <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/2T5FVSZ>
Anyone else run into problems with the Gmail app rendering your images full screen from your HubSpot email templates? Taking a 30px wide image and making it 300px+
We found out that you have to use “max-width” in your css to solve. The Gmail app will not honor the parent container’s/element’s width in a basic div.
